# Animal Purpose Training (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 1]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[1st Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (a swatch of black cloth)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One indifferent or friendly animal

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 173

You instill the target animal with a general purpose (see the [[Handle Animal (Skill)|Handle Animal]] skill), which can be any purpose except combat training—fighting, guarding, heavy labor, hunting, performance, or riding. This purpose supersedes the animal’s previous trained purpose and any tricks it knows. When the spell ends, the animal reverts to its previous trained purpose and known tricks.
